rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the regulation of drinking water, but we're not sure how you want legislation governing the supply of drinking water to be updated.

In any case, the regulation of drinking water has been updated regularly in the past 27 years. The current regulations relating to drinking water, enacted in 2018, are available here: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/wsi/2018/647/regulation/4/made
